info.title: Orders
info.description:
Through this reference you can consult and update orders. 

**Status**

Status | Meaning
--------- | ----------
order_created | Initial order status, no payment has been made
awaiting_payment | Waiting for payment, normally occurs in orders using bank slip as a payment method
authorized_payment | The payment has been authorized but not yet captured or confirmed
payment_accept | Payment of the order placed and approved, this status is used for order confirmation
separating_items | In preparation for shipping
dispatched | Order dispatched
delivered | Delivered to the customer
canceled | Order canceled

get.description:
Retrieves the order information with the corresponding order ID.

**Status**

Status | Meaning
--------- | ----------
order_created | Initial order status, no payment has been made
awaiting_payment | Waiting for payment, normally occurs in orders using bank slip as a payment method
authorized_payment | The payment has been authorized but not yet captured or confirmed
payment_accept | Payment of the order placed and approved, this status is used for order confirmation
separating_items | In preparation for shipping
dispatched | Order dispatched
delivered | Delivered to the customer
canceled | Order canceled

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: API accepts only JSON type data

put.description:
Updates the order information with the corresponding order ID.

**Status**

Status | Meaning
--------- | ----------
order_created | Initial order status, no payment has been made
awaiting_payment | Waiting for payment, normally occurs in orders using bank slip as a payment method
authorized_payment | The payment has been authorized but not yet captured or confirmed
payment_accept | Payment of the order placed and approved, this status is used for order confirmation
separating_items | In preparation for shipping
dispatched | Order dispatched
delivered | Delivered to the customer
canceled | Order canceled

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: API accepts only JSON type data

get.description:
Retrieves information for all orders. **Status** Status | Meaning --------- | ---------- order_created | Initial order status, no payment has been made awaiting_payment | Waiting for payment, normally occurs in orders using bank slip as a payment method authorized_payment | The payment has been authorized but not yet captured or confirmed payment_accept | Payment of the order placed and approved, this status is used for order confirmation separating_items | In preparation for shipping dispatched | Order dispatched delivered | Delivered to the customer canceled | Order canceled **Filters** If necessary it is possible to send filters, they are informed directly in the request URL as GET. *Example* - {slug-landingpage}/orders?created_at_min=2022-07-26&created_at_max=2022-07-29&limit=7

*Example Pagination* - {slug-landingpage}/orders?created_at_min=2022-07-26&created_at_max=2022-07-29&page=2&per_page=100

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: API accepts only JSON type data

parameters.name: created_at_min
parameters.description: Minimum range when data was created (format: 2022-01-13)

parameters.name: created_at_max
parameters.description: Maximum range when data was created (format: 2022-01-13)

TOKEN.description: Token provided for your landing page
